Package DBOperations

Class DBOperationsGrade

java.lang.Object
DBOperations.DBOperationsGrade
public class DBOperationsGrade
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles database operations involving grade objects

  • Method Details

    • getGrades

      public java.util.ArrayList<Grade> getGrades​(java.lang.String username)
      This method returns all grades of a given student, regarless of course. This is used for the faculty studentGrades.jsp page
      Parameters:
      username -
      Returns:
      grades ArrayList

    • getCourseGrades

      public java.util.ArrayList<Grade> getCourseGrades​(java.lang.String studentUsername, java.lang.String courseID)
      getCourseGrades This method takes two parameters. A student username and a courseID. These parameters are used to query the database for all grade information of a particular student and a particular course. The resulting grade information is used to construct grade objects. These objects are placed within an arrayList of grade objects which are then returned. This method is used for functionality in the course grade page.
      Parameters:
      studentUsername -
      courseID -
      Returns:
      courseGrade ArrayList

    • getWeight

      public java.lang.String getWeight​(java.lang.String assignmentID)
      getWeight This method takes the assignmentID of any assignment and returns the weight of that assignment as it is held within the database
      Parameters:
      assignmentID -
      Returns:
      weight String

    • getStudentCourses

      public java.util.ArrayList<StudentCourse> getStudentCourses​(java.lang.String studentUsername)
      getStudentCourses This method takes as input the student username. It returns an arrayList of StudentCourse objects. Student course objects are objects that link together a particular course with a particular student. This is useful for calculating student averages for entire courses.
      Parameters:
      studentUsername -
      Returns:

    • updateGrade

      public boolean updateGrade​(java.lang.String assignmentID, java.lang.String studentUsername, java.lang.String newGrade)
      this method updates the ma_grade table. If a studentUsername / assignmentID composite key is not currently in the database, it will populate the database with new data. Otherwise the data identified by the composite key will be updated.
      Parameters:
      assignmentID -
      studentUsername -
      newGrade -
      Returns:

    • gradeInDatabase

      public boolean gradeInDatabase​(java.lang.String assignmentID, java.lang.String studentUsername)
      Enter an assignmentID and a student Username If a record exists in the ma_grade table where assignmentID = assignmentID and username = username return true
      Parameters:
      assignmentID -
      studentUsername -
      Returns:
      result Boolean
